cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
We have a 2008 Toyota Prius with only 30000 miles on it. In great condition and would make a great commuter car.
The best deal on the lot! This is a great workhorse of a car. It has 145,000 miles, but will go for another 100,000 with proper care.
